reviewText:
what you get:
2 dvds
2 blu ray disks: 6 episodes on 1 Blu ray, 4 on the other as well as some extra goodies

personally this should have been released at the beginning of the year but i digress

fist off, to not spoil i will be general in my description

Fairy tail is back in another action packed season. the first few episodes are fluff, no real point other than some good old fairy tail caused laughs and hysterics.

old friends return in this season, as well as new ones, to help out our favorite team of fairy tail  on their quests.

for fans of natsu, the bane of flame is back with hunger,a fire in his belly...and motion sickness???

the celestial maiden is back, lucy is showing off her fashion sense in a variety of cloths as well as some fan favorites and with the ever popular PLU.

for  fans of gray, out favorite ice wizard is back, showing off and being cool,...and stripping....GRAY YOUR CLOTHS!

the queen of fairys is back, with blades, new armor, and a hatred of..... columns? titania erza  is here!.

all these plus our other fairy tail members are present so don't be sad, be glad and join the fun.

ok now onto my review lol, i felt this part 1 went by fast i have re-watched it 3 times already and its still good, but leaves you on a cliff hanger, but part 2 is out in a few weeks, (just hope its price drops).

overall i believe fairy tail is one of the best modern animes around, it has things for all ages and brings a lot to the table without being repetitive or stale, and will always have the ability to inspire those who watch it. so my only complaint is that it was to quick to watch, other than that no issues and highly recommend it

i haven't gotten my copy ,but i know i got the other volumes funimation realsed. i got say i was into the anime when i got the manga it is really good. so i think the fairy tail anime is something worth getting. i not sure if they dub all of it cause there alot to dub. but hey alteast it something.
So glad to have these episodes at last. Truly a great addition to my collection. Really happy to see these episodes. I am going to love the rest. Ready to see what is next.
i already finished the japanese dub and now i am watching in english and theres some good story arcs coming up and the return of an old foe. i cant wait for more of the funimation dub!

At last, Fairy Tail season 5 will hit its release day very soon and most importantly it will be English Dubbed! Just like all Fairy Tail lovers, I too can't wait to see what the Fairy Tail gang has to show us. May I say, that the Fairy Tail fans seem to be the most supportive through out every release and continuation of this series, and I too being a fan will support the creators and support of Fairy Tail till the very end. An amazing show deserves nothing but the best! Keep them coming guys.

This anime is awesome. I've watched up to part four and it drove me crazy that they currently didn't have anymore. I tried to keep up with all the news for the new releases for this. I saw this and started squirming. I can't wait

If you have seen any of the previous Fairy Tail episodes (the english dubbed that have been released by FUNI), then you can understand why this is AWESOME! I have been waiting a VERY VERY VERY long time for the second season to finally start it's release. And now if the pattern follows, we will have all of season 2 out by January 2014. I'm giddy!!!
Excellent show or series of amime.
Its been 2 years and im still buying more episodes

This is a good series, it filled the void that bleach left in me by its downward spiral in quality.  So far in this series there has only been two episodes I've had to fast forward past because the story and voice acting of the villain was terrible.  I enjoy the manga also but am kinda burned out on all the sexuality the author feels he needs to express.  I feel this story and the characters are strong enough on their own that they don't need panty shots and the nude scenes for shock factor.  Maybe the author is just sexually frustrated with his life and can only express those feelings through his manga?  I dunno but I'm not anti-sex its just this series is so neat and I feel it does not need any of that.
fairy tail is a good anime, i really enjoy the genre elements it brings

Great start for season 2. This part will have you hooked, as it's about the resurrection of nirvana a dangerous spell that can turn light into darkness.
Best series every. This is by far one of my most favorite and loved series. Has Great Action/Adventure/Fighting and a really great story plot. A must have for any anime fan :).

After the high octane of the back to back "Tower of Heaven" and "Fighting Festiva,l" "Oracion Seis" takes its time. It introduces the lovable Wendy and her cat friend Carla (or Charlie as the manga says) as they fight one of the dark guilds known as "Oracion Seis." The fighting is more slowly paced than previous arcs and some of the members aren't quite as memorable (looking at you Racer) but the arc is still as thrilling as one could expect from Fairy Tail. So check it out if you have liked previous episodes.
It came in great condition and there was no problems with the package. And it came on time too. thank you.
He loves it and the price better than department stores!
I love the series and loved this disc set. I plan to attain all of the DVD sets in time.
As it was a gift, I no longer have this product. The recipient really enjoyed it and I hear the case holds up nicely.
My grandson once again was very pleased with vol. 5, but because we don't blue ray so we can't get vol. 6. Please let us know if and where we can get vol. 6 on dvd.
If you follow alone with this series, you won't be disappointed. Excellent storyline for young and old. Great packaging and fast shipping.
Every time a new set of Fairy Tail pops up on amazon I count down the days till it comes out. This is my all time favorite anime. Everyone needs to see it!
LOVE IT! That pretty much sums up what I have to say about this product. I would definitely recommend this anime series to anyone.

If you haven't seen this I suggest you get it. It's like watching a mythic multicultural hodge podge, at least that's how I feel when I watch it. The character's are great and the english voice acting is fantastic, I can't get enough of Natsu(Todd Haberkorn) and have taken interest in a lot of his other work since I fell in love with this, thanks for an awesome show and keep up the good work guys and gals!
The anime hand opinions on language (English, or Japines), and to add both the picture sceens, and also perfect volume of the voices & action sceens were great.
I love the anime. I am 19 and study anime and film, but when I watch Fairy Tail i always feel like a little child again :)

If you are  a fan of the Fairy Tail series, this collection won't disappoint you. It picks up just after the last collection leaves off, and after a small break, plunges you straight into another intense saga! Definitely worth watching!

Funimation did a great job on making this anime's dub. The only thing I wish they would do ( but they need to make money) is release more episodes together instead of 12 at a time. I know they later on release 24 at the same time, but I want the FT Episodes as soon as they hit English Dub so I buy them rather soon =D
arrived earlier then expected, quality is excerlant and by having both blu ray and normal dvd i can watch it anyway. great quality and up there in my list of favourite animie :)

the purchase of these dvds. In a few months, you will be able to get twice the episodes for the same price in a collection. But if you are a fan, and you have to have it RIGHT NOW. I guess I can understand buying it. Plus, as ridiculous as the prices can be, anime is a fairly niche market, and it really does rely on strong dvd sales. So if you have tons of expendable income, I can recommend this. But if you are like me, and do not want to spend 30 bucks on a dvd with only eleven 23 minutes episodes, wait for the collection.
its came in good condition with no problem it is an excellent anime and it was amazing to watch and see
It works perfectly! I love this anime and was excited to finally get it in the mail. I was happy to see that it worked. I suggest you order it.

i'm a huge anime fan and when you guys started to have fairy tail for sale i totally jumped at the opportunity to buy them (all so far) my friends got me hooked on them saying you should get netflix..i don't want netflix so i just buy them myself here on amazon!

the quality of this product is good i didn't have any issues with any of the disks and i like the fact that i can play them in both dvd AND bluray!

hope you guys enjoy the show it's awesome!

If your a fan you already know how awesome this series is, but if you are new you can't go wrong adding this to your collection! My whole family loves watching Fairytail. This series is complete it contains all elements of a great storyline.
Fun, action packed and comedy. Fans of fairytail will love this part of the story. In other words, A good buy.
i really enjoyed the product. Delivery was fast, it arrived in perfect condition, and it was very entertaining to watch. I would definitely recommend it for everyone to watch.

I'm totally happy there was more Fairy Tail! Thank you FUNimation! I didn't know what would've happened to the series when it was suddenly stopped. But I'm happy they are doing more Fairy Tail DVD's. I have the original 4 and can't wait for more.
Words can't explain how great this show is. Its definitely a must watch. Hurry up and buy it. Will nit be disappointed
the package arrives quickly and in good condition and the material is very good GREAT JOB.
I hate getting to a cliff hanger point on the very last cd to be forced to hurry up and by the next one.  However this was great.  There is hardly any filler at all.

Let me start by saying this arc is amazing. Its the first time Fairy Tail teams up with other guilds. Some familiar characters and some new ones. Wendy is an awesome, cute, and funny character. The packaging is superb with a slip cover and reversible Wendy cover. 5/5 even the price was $29.99. Get it.
12 episodes 24 mins each it is great and please buy it so we can get the edolas arc so please buy

It has been a while since the release of Fairy Tail for fans to enjoy wit Blu-ray quality. First let's review the basic economics of this package. You get 12 episodes with this package, while having to usual special commentary episodes and trailers for around $30 (what i paid). This works out to $2.50 for a 25 min episode. Some might find that a bit steep but consider the fact that FUNimation is bringing this to us from Japan and the voice actors, directors, translators all need to get paid for their hard work. That being said, looking at the crossed out price for this volume and the current next volume set for $47 (almost $4 an episode!) is asking much. Especially considering how the 2nd disc only has the last 4 episodes, leaving me feeling that 4 more could have been put into this volume if they are going to put 8 on the first disc. FUNimation take note!! Don't get greedy and alienate your fans! I think $24-30 for new release is fair enough though.

Now for the content. The first few episodes are just like prior in-between story arc episodes that were very humorous and entertaining with hints of the coming conflict. Then the story begins to really unfold as familiar faces begin to reappear as allies or foes to keep you on the edge of wondering what happens next. There were a few shocking surprises I didn't see coming as well as those that appeared to be predictable before taking a sudden deviation from what I expected. The story goes to highlight how Fairy Tail's strongest team continue to grow as individuals as well as in their abilities. That is a plus as the stagnation of character growth can wear a series down. No such feeling with this saga.

This arc ties into past arcs as Fairy Tail members and their allies take on more powerfully dangerous wizards. It contains all the elements fans of this series enjoy with the quirky humor, action, great story, and lovable characters. The English voice actors continue to be amazing in their capturing the variety of emotions and quirkiness of the series. I definitely recommend continuing the adventure with this volume. If you are new to Fairy Tail, I highly recommend to start watching this series from the beginning and strong recommendation as a must have to any anime fan's collection! It is certainly one of those rare series I will keep coming back to.
